alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 26 at 5:42PM CST until February 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Pushmataha and Choctaw Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities are expected to be reduced to a quarter mile or less by the dense fog, creating hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Motorists should exercise caution while driving. Be alert to sudden gusts of wind which may cause you to lose control of your vehicle. Extra attention should be given to cross winds and on bridges and overpasses.
